org.jasig.cas.web.view

Class AjaxAwareJsonExceptionResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.view.json.exception.JsonExceptionResolver
      • org.jasig.cas.web.view.AjaxAwareJsonExceptionResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.web.servlet.HandlerExceptionResolver

    public class AjaxAwareJsonExceptionResolver
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.view.json.exception.JsonExceptionResolver
    Implementation of JsonExceptionResolver that only triages the exception occurred for JSON requests.
    Since:
    4.0.0
    Author:
    Misagh Moayyed
